inn1.comm: short of a length outside off stump, not much bounce on that one, Tamim watches it slant across him and lets it go
and this ball dies as Tamim shoulders arms once again and bounces just in front of the wicketkeeper. Thomas and the slips come up a step or two.

a hush falls over the Shere Bangla as Tamim departs for a duck. The ball was fuller and wider outside off stump and Tamim, who let the previous two go, chased this. He went really hard at the ball, aiming to lash it through cover, but ended up nicking it to second slip, where Sammy caught it. And look at those celebrations ... massive wicket
defended on the front foot on the off side
another edge but this brings a huge roar. Siddique's slash flies over the slips and races to the third-man boundary. That was short of a length and wide outside off again
fuller ball and on a straighter line, Siddique comes forward and drives straight. The fielder at mid-on runs to his right to cut it off
Kayes turns his first ball off his pads behind square and gets off the mark
Siddique stays in his crease and defends a good length ball coming into him on the back foot
played back to the bowler with a straight bat
tossed up with room on offer outside off, Siddique moves his foot forward a touch and drives the ball fluently through cover point. This outfield is quick
played towards square leg for a single
Kayes this time,goes deep in his crease to punch a slightly shorter ball through cover. Miller gives chase and reaches the ball just inside the boundary
short of a length on the body, Kayes stays in his crease and tucks the ball off his hips towards fine leg
Siddique attempts to pull but gets beaten by a short ball that angles across him. He rehearses the shot again
glanced down to fine leg once again and Siddique gets off strike
fuller length and straighter, Kayes gets right behind the line, stays on the back foot and defends with a straight bat. There's a huge cheer even for that dot ball
defended confidently once again towards the bowler
short of a length and straight, Kayes stands tall in his crease and defends the ball on the leg side
short and wide outside off and Siddique slaps the ball fearfully hard towards cover where Bravo stops the ball
defended on the back foot towards the off side

caught behind! Short of a length but closer to the body outside off stump. Kayes stays in his crease, moves on to the back foot and pokes at the ball with an open face. Tentative shot with no real purpose and the outside edge is taken by Thomas
defended on the back foot on the off side
nudged off the pads towards square leg
good length and rather straight. Mushfiqur gets behind the line and defends
short ball without much room to play the pull but Siddique swivels and plays a short-arm pull towards long leg
fuller length on leg and middle, Siddique defends on the front foot
shot, the length was too full on middle and off. Siddique moved forward and played a punchy drive straight down the ground. The fielder at mid-off flew to his left but the ball beat his dive
short of a length on off stump, played off the back foot towards point
short of a length on the hips, Siddique glances the ball towards fine leg
short ball down leg side, Siddique tries to pull but the ball is too far away
good length ball on middle stump, Siddique is solid in defence, plays it back to the bowler

caught at short midwicket! Sammy is on fire today, though the ball wasn't outstanding. Full ball on middle and leg, Mushfiqur wanted to flick and made very good contact, striking the ball hard. He flicked it in the air though and Sarwan barely had to move at short midwicket. That is a sharp catch. Mirpur falls silent for the third time.
full length outside off, steered behind point towards third man for one
short of a length on leg stump, Siddique hoists the ball off the front foot over midwicket. There's no fielder in the deep and there are cheers again
good length, pitching on middle and angling across the left-hander. Siddique strides forward and blocks
played off the front foot towards mid-on
what happened there? That pitched on leg and seamed sharply across the left hander, squaring him up a touch and beating the bat. Did that hit a crack?
short of a length and seaming across the left-hander. Shakib is beaten as he attempts to defend from the crease
defended on the back foot towards the bowler
too straight and Shakib turns the ball off his pads behind square
good length and the line is on middle, Shakib is steady in his crease and punches towards the bowler
Roach bowls the first yorker of the game, forcing Shakib to dig it out towards midwicket
driven fluently but straight to the bowler, the length was fuller this time
Siddique tries to play a forceful drive on the off side but gets an inside edge on to the pad
Siddique strides forward an defends on the off side
too straight on leg stump, played off the pads towards square leg
fuller length with width outside off, Shakib drives with flair and makes crisp contact. Pollard makes a sharp save at point
short ball outside off stump, Shakib cuts the ball fine of Pollard towards third man
Sammy pitches on leg, allowing Siddique to play the ball off his pads through midwicket
that's a no-ball, and also a wide down leg side, but it was a no-ball first. Free hit coming up ...
Roach bowls a terrific yorker and Siddique is forced to dig it out. Splendid free-hit ball.

lbw! Siddique falls to another yorker. But he wants a review. Roach delivered a lethal yorker on middle stump, made more lethal by Siddique's decision to play across the line towards midwicket. The ball struck him full on the front shoe and that is hitting middle stump. That review was in hope more than anything else. Bangladesh tottering ...
good length ball angling into the right-hander from just outside off, defended on the off side
driven fluently off the front foot towards cover, fuller length on off from Roach
short of a length around off, cut towards point
full ball on off stump, played towards cover on the front foot
short of a length and straight, Shakib defends on the back foot towards the off side
short and wide outside off stump, Shakib stays in his crease and swats the ball dismissively through cover point, lifts the gloom for an instant at the Shere Bangla
this kept low and was closer to off stump, Shakib tried to play it through the off and inside edged it into the ground and towards the kepeer
Skahib plays the cut but mis-hits it into the ground towards cover
fuller length on off stump, Shakib drives off the front foot towards mid-off
played off the back foot towards cover point
lots of flight from round the wicket, Raqibul leans forward an drives towards the fielder on the sweeper boundary

bowled him! Another flighted delivery that dips on Shakib outside off stump, Shakib didn't really do anything. He should have come forward but he stayed in his crease and made a limp effort at defending. The ball pitched just outside off and spun into the left-hander, beat the bat and hit the stumps. Benn roars.
Benn bowls a full arm ball outside off and beats Ashraful's attempt to play behind point
driven wonderfully, from the crease and through the gap at cover. Benn over-pitched that ball and it was there for the drive
Benn is looping the ball into the blockhole from a tremendous height. Ashraful plays towards cover
Benn draws Raqibul forward with his length, pitches the ball just outside off and spins it past the outside edge
good length around off stump from Sammy, Ashraful defends towards the bowler
Ashraful plays back to a good length ball outside off and edges on to the pad
this keeps a touch low and is rather straight. Played off the pads towards square leg
Ashraful gets behind the line of a good length ball and defends on the back foot
a bit too straight, allowing Ashraful the freedom to tuck the ball off his hips towards fine leg
good length outside off stump, Raqibul tries to play on the off but gets an inside edge on to the leg side
played off the back foot towards the off side
Been gives the ball a lot of air outside off, Ashraful drives through point
lots of flight and loop from Benn outside off, Raqibul plays towards cover
quicker ball, Raqibul defends on the back foot
shorter and flatter, Raqibul cuts but can't beat Pollard at point
slower this time, with flight, driven off the front foot towards long-off
good length ball angling into the right-hander. Defended confidently towards the bowler
he tried to play that off the front foot and shouts of 'catch' as it goes off the inside edge, on to the pad, and lobs on the off side
defended with an open face towards point
shorter and wider outside off, steered towards third man. Bangladesh reach 50, and that is perhaps the largest cheer I've heard for a team's fifty
tight line and length, around off and middle, defended on the front foot with bat and pad close together

caught at point! Fuller ball, wide outside off stump. Raqibul leans forward to drive and plays far away from his body. A real loose shot. The edge travels in the air towards Pollard, who throws his huge body forward at point to take a sharp chance. Shambolic batting.
beaten as he tries to defend on the back foot
defended on the front foot

Benn loops the ball into the right-hander from round the wicket, beats the batsman with the length, spins the ball past the outside edge. Ashraful had lunged forward to play the ball and dragged his back foot on the line. Thomas whipped off the bails and it is referred to the third umpire. Ashraful had got a fraction of his boot behind the crease in time.
played off the front foot on the off side
played towards cover on the front foot
Ashraful edges the ball wide of first slip as he tries to defend on the front foot. That turned away from the right-hander quite a bit after drifting into him
Sammy hits a good length outside off and beats the bat.
fuller ball angling into middle stump, played through midwicket from the crease
solid defence on the front foot. Sammy kept that on a good length around off
short of a length outside off stump, Ashraful stays on the back foot and cuts the ball hard behind point. I don't think third man spotted that, I don't think he would have stopped it if he did
good length angling into off and middle, Ashraful gets behind the line and defends on the front foot
defended on the front foot towards the bowler
lovely delivery, turning and bouncing past the defensive poke

.Benn has been bowling beautifully and gets his reward. It was another teasingly flighted delivery on a good length, turning away from the off stump after landing on the middle and off line.  Naeem tried to defend it but the ball turned, bounce, and clipped the outer edge. Benn is usually known for firing those deliveries but he has been a revelation today
full toss, calmly tapped to short midwicket
leans forward to jab this to the on side
on the middle and off line, pushed back down the track
Another big turn and bounce, goes past the poke.

West Indies are screaming in joy. The Mirpur crowd don't know how to react.  It was a full delivery outside off stump and Ash went for a big drive through the off side and getsa  thin nick through to the delighted keeper.
in the zone outside off and the keeper takes this
goes for the yorker and Razzak just about digs it out
lands around leg and middle and moves towards middle, stabbed to short-leg
fullish, on the pads, tucked behind square-leg for a single
in the channel outside off stump and the batsman has a nervous poke at it and the ball rushes past the edge
turns in from outside off, defended to the off
tosses this up full outside off, driven to right of mid-off

There is a gully in place and he steers it straight to him! What was he thinking there? It turned away from the off stump and he opened the bat face and steered it to gully where Pollard took a lovely catch. He leaned forward, got his big hands under the dying ball and pouched it so safely and cleanly.
a full toss around off, perhaps he was trying a yorker, pushed out to mid-off

Benn does a Afridi. He fires a yorker and the batsman had no chance. Bangladesh have folded up for their lowest score ever! Crazy crazy day at Mirpur. Benn roars. His team-mates have a laugh. Bangladesh are all out and and the home crowd is getting angry and restless.

inn2.comm: on the hips, tucked to square-leg
slip and a short midwicket in. Again on the pads, glanced down to fine-leg
slower, full and around off stump, steered to point
goes back and across to punch a good-length delivery to mid-off
full in length on the middle, driven back to the bowler
homing in on the off stump, punched out to cover
leans forward to defend it towards mid-on
goes for the sweep but doesn't connect properly. It was around the leg stump line
gets forward to play a very tentative looking defensive push
another one going down leg, another failed sweep shot and another shout for lbw
quicker, on the middle, whipped through midwicket
stretches well forward to defend
gets forward and across to punch this sweetly through cover point
Another whack. The extra cover dives to his left to make a half-stop
gets forward to tap this to the off side
leans forward and across to drive to cover
That's the Devon Smith shot. He bent his back knee, got back and across, and smacked the length delivery through point. Crash
leans forward to push the good-length delivery to mid-on
flighted outside off stump, moves past the tentative poke and leaped at Rahim, who could only make a half-stop. That reared up shoulder high
takes couple of steps down the track and taps it to midwicket
leans forward to defend and edges it to fine-leg
on the middle stump line, defended to the on side
on the middle stump line, pushed to the on side
gets back to clip this to deep square-leg
full and around the off stump line, pushed out to cover
moves down the track, backs outside leg and heaves this to deep midwicket fielder
short in length, on the middle, clipped past square-leg
Thwack. He moved outside leg and went for the big hit down ground but ended up slicing it a little. It flew over mid-off
Flat-bat! He moved outside leg, the bowler banged it short and Gayle smashed it powerfully over mid-on
tries a slower one but Gayle is ready for it and crashes it to wide long-on boundary

good delivery! It was delivered from round the stumps, drifted in towards leg and middle line and turned just about enough to hit the middle. Smith was playing well inside the line; he thought it would move in towards the leg stump. Fooled by the drift and then by the turn
leans forward to tap towards cover
leans well forward to defend to the off
takes it from around off and flicks it stylishly to midwicket
quicker, skids on to the off stump, Bravo stabbed it of the inner edge to the on side. He was playing for the turn; there wasn't any
slower, on the middle stump line , defended back down the track
floated full on the middle, tapped to the on side
leans forward to tuck this to backward square-leg fielder
moves outside leg, waits and goes for the big off drive but makes contact with the bottom of the bat and the ball rolls to mid-off
pushes this down the leg side and the ball bounds off the keeper's pad
Whippity whip! He moved down the track and whiplashed this flighted delivery aerially through midwicket
Gayle threatens to move outside leg and Razzak fires a wide down the leg side. Rahim does well to stop it
slower, Gayle is through early with his flick shot and the ball goes of the pad
in the zone outside off, Gayle is beaten on the cut
full, really full on the middle, dug out to the off side
gets forward to defend this off break to the off side
nudges this to cover point for a single
moves down the track and is hit on the pad as he has a gentle defensive waft at it
on the middle, turned to backward square-leg
tosses this up, full, and Gayle seizes the opportunity to blast it over mid-off
Short and wide, Bravo rocks back to force it through wide mid-off region
gets forward to tap this to square-leg
pushes this towards short extra cover
gets back to punch it just short of extra cover
flighted full on the middle, eased to short extra cover
retains the strike with an off drive to long-off
from wide of the crease, on the off stump line, pushes to the off and wants a single but is sent back
around the off, defended to the off side
threatens to move down the track but holds that thought and leans forward to defend
on the legs, flicked away for a single
gets well back to clip it to square-leg for a single
on the middle, pushed back to the bowler
on the off stump line, punched out to cover where there is a fumble
on the off, driven to the bowler
on the off stump line, eased to cover
goes back to force it down to long-off
short in length and Gayle presses back to cut it through backward point.
leans well forward to nudge it to the off
leans forward to dab to backward square-leg
almost caught by Shuvo. It was hit towards extra cover where Shuvo lunged forward but couldn't quite hold on
pushes this down the leg side
on the pads, turned to short fine-leg
works this to square-leg for a quick single
gets forward to defend back to the bowler
on the leg and middle, eased to long-on
lets this delivery outside all alone
A bizarre game is over, with a punch to long-on. Bangladesh imploded in a stunning fashion and West Indies reached the target (if it could be called that) without much fuss.
